Articles.Content:
So I was just thinking that it would be cool to be able to assign different thrust to different axis/buttons to allow for two different engines to be running at different powers. For example... I have a Saitek joystick which has multiple axis. Say I have a ship/craft that has VTOL and a main horizontal thrust. I thought it would be nice to assign the main horizontal thrust to the main axis, and the VTOL to another axis. That way I could have the VTOL at a certain percentage, say to hover, while I slowly add on horizontal thrust to start moving forward.

What do y'all think?

+1

I've spent all day trying to design a VTOL style rug/rescue ship to go grab Bill Kerbin from the water about 6 km out. Tried attaching engines to the manoeuvrable canards to no avail.
